alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 5:08AM EDT until May 01 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Union and Newberry Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Lexington and Calhoun Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. Congaree River At Columbia affecting Richland and Lexington Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Greenwood, Newberry and Saluda Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Enoree River At Whitmire. * WHEN...From early this morning to Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, River bottomland near and downstream from Whitmire become flooded. At 28.0 feet, The Coleman Aughtry Road along the river becomes flooded. Do not drive into flooded roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
